name: It's Not Cool
description:
Assume role of the mayor of a small coastal city, caught in the middle of hilariously rapid global warming spurt.

Thematic song:

  • Sprites: Anastasya "Stulte" Pionkovskaya, anastasya.pionkovskaya@gmail.com
  • Click.ogg: generated via bfxr.net
  • Construct.ogg: generated via bfxr.net

    https://www.freesoundeffects.com/free-track/wavebig-89347/
  • Waves.ogg: Orange Free Sounds (Alexander - Calm Sea Waves Sound)
